title: Lag
body: Why is my league of legends so laggy nowadays? My internet is fine. My friends that are using different internets are getting no lag. I usually play on 120-160 ping and now i'm 230-300 ping constant without fail. Can anyone help me?

replies.body:
Latency increases usually happen when ISP routing changes are made, or when there are local network configurations that are problematic. As a quick first step, I suggest taking a stab at our consolidated solutions in our [connection troubleshooting guide. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if your high latency persists.
My ping has been brought up since 2 patches ago and they don't seem to care to fix it
